articles.title: European stocks gain, dollar strong as traders cut Fed easing bets - Reuters
articles.description: U.S. stocks sold off sharply on Friday while the dollar jumped as investors grappled with rising geopolitical tensions and persistent inflation that could lead to diverging monetary policy between the U.S. and Europe.
